content: What Canadian city is home to the CN Tower, one of the world's tallest freestanding structures?

That would be Toronto, Ontario. The CN Tower has been an iconic symbol of Canada and Toronto since its completion in 1976. It held the title of the world's tallest freestanding structure for many years until it was surpassed by other structures like the Burj Khalifa in Dubai. However, it remains a significant landmark and tourist attraction in Canada.
